content:
{"name": "Central United Methodist Church -Nourish Up", "alternate_name": "", "description": ""THANKSGIVING HOLIDAY CLOSURE!
ALL OPERATIONS INCLUDING PANTRIES, MOBILE PANTRIES AND FOOD PHARMACIES, HOME DELIVERIES, FOOD SHARES, MEALS ON WHEELS DELIVERY, MAIN OFFICE AND WAREHOUSE WILL BE CLOSED Thursday November 28, 2024 through Sunday December 1, 2024 in observance of Thanksgiving!"
Announcing the new name for "Loaves & Fishes": "Nourish", same mission, new name.
This is an emergency food pantry that requires a referral and an appointment. To have access to any of their pop-ups, you don't need a referral, ID or financial documents, but pre-registration is required to ensure there is enough food. You can find their upcoming pop-ups and register here: https://nourishup.org/foodshare/
**How To Get A Referral:**
To get a referral please have the following information ready for each person in the household:
▪ First and Last Name
▪ Date of Birth
▪ Phone Number (if available)
▪ Current Address
▪ Gender
▪ Ethnicity
▪ Veteran Status
▪ Receiving Food Stamps/SNAP**
▪ Household Income**
▪ Disability (Y or N)
▪ Email Address (if available)
▪ Date of Pick Up
▪ Preferred Pantry Location and secondary location in case the primary location is at capacity.
-No disribution on the 4th of July
Visit our website at https://nourishup.org/pantries/ under the food pantries tab for a PDF version of our location and hours.", "email": "", "url": "https://nourishup.org/pantries/", "status": "active", "address": {"address_1": "6030 Albemarle Road", "address_2": null, "city": "North Sharon Amity / Reddman Road", "state_province": "NC", "postal_code": "28212", "country": "US"}, "location": {"latitude": 35.2019843, "longitude": -80.7421973}, "phones": [{"number": "(704) 536-9157", "type": "voice"}], "regular_schedule": [{"weekday": "Thursday", "opens_at": "15:00", "closes_at": "16:00"}], "service_attributes": [{"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Registration required"}, {"attribute_key": "REQUIREMENT", "attribute_value": "Referral Required. Lemontree can provide this referral. Please see the requirements in notes."}]}
